attributes.action: Covid vaccines to children as young as 5 in line with other USA/EU countries.
attributes.additional_details: Vulnerable and young kids are the next and only generation now full exposed to virus infection and consequences of it
attributes.background: Accelerate approval for kids as other countries have already obtained approval to protect their kids

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about approving Covid-19 vaccines for particular age groups are an operational matter are a matter for Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency (MHRA), not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Fast-track rollout of Covid vaccine in 5-11s post MHRA approval: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601680
